description:
High-level view of Docker container health and resource usage on the main homelab node.

Top-level panels cover fleet health (recent starts and uptime) and resource usage (CPU as % of host CPU, memory working set, disk I/O, and network throughput). Views are grouped by Docker Compose project (“stack”) and container, with a per-container detail section driven by the selected stack/service/container.

Data source: Prometheus via cAdvisor.

Security: Container metrics can reveal internal service names and operational topology. Restrict access and redact before sharing.

panels.description:
Context: Container metrics collection via cAdvisor.

Focus: Fast “are we scraping cAdvisor?” signal for container-level telemetry.

Implementation: `max(up{job="cadvisor"})` over the panel’s relative time window.
panels.title: cAdvisor exporter status

panels.description:
Context: Container liveness as seen by cAdvisor.

Focus: Quick count of containers that are currently active/recently seen.

Implementation: Counts containers with `(time() - container_last_seen) < 300s`, summed across all non-empty images.
panels.title: Running containers

panels.description:
Context: Total container CPU usage relative to host capacity.

Focus: Show how much of the host CPU is being consumed by containers overall.

Implementation: `100 * sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[5m])) / count(host CPU cores)`, excluding empty image series.
panels.title: Containers CPU vs host

panels.description:
Context: Total container memory working set relative to host RAM.

Focus: Show how much host memory is effectively in use by containers.

Implementation: `100 * sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes) / max(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes)`, excluding empty image series.
panels.title: Containers memory vs host

panels.description:
Context: Per-stack CPU usage (Docker Compose project).

Focus: Identify which stacks are driving overall container CPU consumption over time.

Implementation: sum by (compose project) of `100 * rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[5m]) / host core count`
panels.title: CPU by stack

panels.description:
Context: Per-container CPU share of host capacity.

Focus: Quickly pinpoint the main CPU consumers across stacks/services.

Implementation: topk(5) of `100 * rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[5m]) / host core count`; table fields organized via “Organize fields by name”.
panels.title: Top containers – CPU

panels.description:
Context: Per-stack memory footprint (working set).

Focus: See which stacks hold the largest memory working set over time.

Implementation: sum by (compose project) of `container_memory_working_set_bytes` (excluding empty image series).
panels.title: Memory by stack

panels.description:
Context: Per-container memory working set.

Focus: Identify the containers with the highest current memory footprint.

Implementation: topk(5) of `container_memory_working_set_bytes`; table fields organized via “Organize fields by name”.
panels.title: Top containers – memory

panels.description:
Context: Per-stack filesystem I/O throughput.

Focus: Spot stacks generating sustained read/write pressure.

Implementation: sum by (compose project) of `rate(reads_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(writes_bytes_total[5m])` from cAdvisor filesystem counters.
panels.title: Disk I/O by stack

panels.description:
Context: Per-container filesystem I/O throughput.

Focus: Identify which specific containers are generating the most disk I/O.

Implementation: topk(5) of `rate(reads_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(writes_bytes_total[5m])`; table fields organized via “Organize fields by name”.
panels.title: Top containers – disk I/O

panels.description:
Context: Per-stack network throughput (Rx+Tx total).

Focus: Spot which stacks are driving network load and sustained throughput changes.

Implementation: sum by (compose project) of `rate(receive_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(transmit_bytes_total[5m])` from cAdvisor network counters.
panels.title: Network by stack

panels.description:
Context: Per-container network throughput (Rx+Tx total).

Focus: Quickly identify the top “network talkers” across stacks/services.

Implementation: topk(5) of `rate(receive_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(transmit_bytes_total[5m])`; table fields organized via “Organize fields by name”.
panels.title: Top containers – network

panels.description:
Context: Container restarts/starts observed by cAdvisor.

Focus: Surface containers that have started within the last hour (useful for spotting recent restarts).

Implementation: Filters containers where `(time() - container_start_time_seconds) < 3600`; when present, the returned value is the current uptime in seconds.
panels.title: Recent container starts

panels.description:
Context: Current container uptime.

Focus: Provide a quick “how long has it been running?” snapshot across containers.

Implementation: `time() - container_start_time_seconds`; table fields organized via “Organize fields by name”.
panels.title: Container uptime snapshot

panels.description:
Context: Selected container CPU usage relative to host capacity.

Focus: Inspect CPU behaviour for one container in detail and correlate with spikes above.

Implementation: `100 * rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[5m]) / host core count` filtered by compose project/service and cAdvisor name.
panels.title: CPU – $stack / $service / $container

panels.description:
Context: Selected container memory working set.

Focus: Inspect memory footprint for one container and detect step changes or growth.

Implementation: `container_memory_working_set_bytes` filtered by compose project/service and cAdvisor name.
panels.title: Memory  – $stack / $service / $container

panels.description:
Context: Selected container filesystem I/O throughput.

Focus: Inspect read/write pressure for one container and correlate with host/storage symptoms.

Implementation: `rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total[5m])` filtered by compose project/service and cAdvisor name.
panels.title: Disk I/O – $stack / $service / $container

panels.description:
Context: Selected container network throughput (Rx+Tx total).

Focus: Inspect network activity for one container and correlate with service behaviour.

Implementation: `rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total[5m]) + rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total[5m])` filtered by compose project/service and cAdvisor name.
panels.title: Network  – $stack / $service / $container

list.description: Docker Compose project (stack) discovered by cAdvisor.
list.label: stack
list.name: stack

list.description: Docker Compose service within the selected stack.
list.label: service
list.name: service

list.description: Container name within the selected stack and service.
list.label: container
list.name: container

title: Containers – Docker overview
